skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Skilled in building dynamic and user-friendly interfaces using React, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. Experienced in creating interactive web tools and custom applications to enhance user experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Proficient in Java, C, Python, C++, R, and Scala, with expertise in database management using SQLite and PostgreSQL. Experienced in building RESTful APIs and integrating backend systems to support seamless data processing.

skills.title: Data Analysis
skills.description: Adept at leveraging Power BI, Power Automate, and machine learning to drive data-driven insights. Developed interactive dashboards and automated classification models to enhance business efficiency and decision-making

skills.title: Other
skills.description: Strong background in process management, workflow automation, and cross-functional collaboration. Experienced in Agile methodologies, IT service management, and problem-solving to drive efficiency and continuous improvement.
